pullrequest.title: catkinize drcsim with new atlas model (catkin drcsim 3.1.0 candidate)

content.raw:
What's the release plan for this change on Precise, where we use Groovy?  Hosting our own version of some ROS debs sounds worse to me than just keeping the duplicate code inside drcsim until we drop support for Groovy.

And as a developer, I'd much prefer to have drcsim build against Groovy as is, without needing to pull some ROS stuff from source.
content.html:
What's the release plan for this change on Precise, where we use Groovy? Hosting our own version of some ROS debs sounds worse to me than just keeping the duplicate code inside drcsim until we drop support for Groovy.

And as a developer, I'd much prefer to have drcsim build against Groovy as is, without needing to pull some ROS stuff from source.
